text: Pieter Marinus "Piet" Blauw (30 September 1937 â€“ 16 May 2019) was a Dutch politician and farmer. He was a member of the People's Party for Freedom and Democracy (VVD). He became a member of the House of Representatives in 1981, serving until 1998. He born in Alkmaar, North Holland. Blauw died on 16 May 2019 in Veendam, Groningen. He was 81. ==References== Category:1937 births Category:2019 deaths Category:Members of the House of Representatives of the Netherlands Category:People from Alkmaar Category:People's Party for Freedom and Democracy politicians Category:Politicians from North Holland
title: Piet Blauw
